channel.title: The One-Eyed Man
channel.managingEditor: the-one-eyed-man@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Mike Stopforth | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.description:
At my core I am an entrepreneur who builds and operates companies to solve social and digital challenges. I balance my days as founder of Beyond Binary, as a global speaker, and as an investor in exciting projects.

Through Beyond Binary I drive the evolution of digitally relevant and socially impactful leadership in organisations around the world.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: In the land of the blind, the one-eyed man is king
channel.itunes:author: Mike Stopforth | Solid Gold Podcast Studios
